name: Sudo
longDescription: ## Images ![Minion](https://octodex.github.com/images/minion.png) ![Stormtroopocat](https://octodex.github.com/images/stormtroopocat.jpg "The Stormtroopocat") Like links, Images also have a footnote style syntax ![Alt text][id] With a reference later in the document defining the URL location: [id]: https://octodex.github.com/images/dojocat.jpg  "The Dojocat" ## Plugins
